In England, in the seven days to 14 April, there were 179,225 new confirmed cases (316.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 April, there were 261,054 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 31% (81,829 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 April is 18,398,440 (32,534.7 cases per 100,000 population).
